1.content: Before you must choice your destination...
1.title: The story begins...

choices: In the city or in the hotel
111.title: Madrid

choices: Carlos, a 10 years old boy, brown hair and eyes
Juan, a 11 years old boy with brown hairs and green eyes
Valentin, a 12 years old boy, black hairs and eyes
1113.content:
I'm on the highway to Madrid. I'm so excited to visit this beautiful city and I can not wait to start ... I'm driving non stop from several hours and I need a break so I decided to stop in the closer autogrill.
Parking the car and I see that there is not a lot of people but by a bus a bunch kids of about 11 and 12 years are coming down, appear to be part of a football team.
I enter inside and order a coffee and a croissant. The kids meanwhile start to generate confusion. The kids begin to order, who fruit juices, who croissants, and I move to make room and inadvertently crush one foot to one of them.
I apologize to him trying to speak in Spanish, but he stares at me with a look of evil and grins to me.
I finish and go to the bathroom. While I am inside to piss, someone knocks and I say that it is busy but he keeps knocking making me so angry I open the door and I see the same boy who I had crushed his foot.
With an extremely strong push pushes me inside and closes the door.
He looks at me and says something.
But how is the boy and how old is he?
1113.title: In the autoroute towards Madrid

choices: Enter in a bar for a drink or a gelato
Go to supermarket and buy something for apartment you divide with three guys
125.content:
You are walking in the street of Montpellier, a city where you are to start your six months of study. You could choose between different places but your choice was for France...
You want know the city where you must pass next months, so you start to visit...
After a beautiful walk in the centre you decided to...
125.title: Montpellier

15.content: You were at the airport in which German city?
15.title: GERMANY

choices: Before you go out of hotel a kid call you in the elevator cause seem need help
151.content: You are in Berlin and you are now ready to discover this new city you wanted to visit so much. You take a Taxi and go in hotel. After you are ready to go out, you take your Canon to make good photos, the city map and you go.
151.title: Berlin

info.brief_description: you travel in a foreign country for holidays alone or with family but you'll not return...
info.description: You can change some profiles of people that must leave in some other country for holiday or work, but there will meet their fate, their orrible fate because children are hungry and want play...
